briefTitle: Bringing of PET-TDM FDG in the Determination of the Characteristics of Primary Mammary Tumors TrIple Negatives
officialTitle: Bringing Semi-quantitative PET-TDM FDG Data and Texture Analysis to Clinical, Histological and Immuno-histochemical Characteristics of Primary Mammary Tumors Triple Negatives
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Assess the prognostic value of the texture parameters of PET-TDM FDG on event-free survival at 2 years.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patient with biopsy-proven triple-negative breast cancer, newly diagnosed, naïve from any treatment.
* Age - 18.
* Performance Status (PS) : 0 or 1.
* No metastasis on the extension balance.
* Treatment provided immediately by lumpectomy or mastectomy, and accepted by the patient.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Severe illness or comorbidity at risk.
* A history of cancer within 5 years, with the exception of skin carcinomas (other than melanoma) or in-situ cervical carcinomas.
* Patient candidate for neo-adjuvant therapy.
